Firearm.  They will get you to see Iron Raptor eventually.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> (ooc)I want to have my character Windrider, who is
> currently on board the CF, report to Iron Raptor to
> offer his services to the Maximals. How could I go
> about doing that?
>
